remarks: The predicate " ` N ` is a neighborhood of ` S ` ."  (Contributed by FL, 25-Sep-2006.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 11-Nov-2013.)
statement:
neifval.1 $e |- X = U. J $.
isnei $p |- ( ( J e. Top /\ S C_ X ) -> ( N e. ( ( nei ` J ) ` S ) <-> ( N C_ X /\ E. g e. J ( S C_ g /\ g C_ N ) ) ) ) $.
$d J g $.
$d N g $.
$d S g $.
$d X g $.
